meaningMnemonic: If you want to have your <radical>wedding</radical> in a <radical>car</radical> you're going to need a lot of <kanji>help</kanji>. Cars are pretty small compared to weddings, so if you don't get help from everyone you know you won't be able to pull it off.
readingMnemonic: You can't just ask for <kanji>help</kanji> on the day of the wedding, either. You have to <reading>sche</reading>dule (すけ) getting your friends' help ahead of time. They might have pretty tight schedules too, so make sure you plan early!
